category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 18 (Application mutatis mutandis of other laws)
contents: Article 18 (Application of other laws) Articles 15, 18, 20, and 23 of the Administrative Appeals Act for matters not provided for in the Act, Decree, or these regulations in relation to the deliberation and operation of the review committee. , Articles 27, 32, 37, 41, 45, 47, and 57 shall apply mutatis mutandis, but a request for adjudication shall be regarded as a request for examination and a decision shall be regarded as a decision. Revised 2022. 9. 16.
